previewArticle.title: LA Galaxy vs. Colorado Rapids | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: LA Galaxy 6, Colorado Rapids 0 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: Joe Nasco (Colorado Rapids) is shown the red card.
timelineItems.title: RED CARD: Joe Nasco ejected for taking down Alan Gordon

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Penalty conceded by Joe Nasco (Colorado Rapids) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty LA Galaxy. Alan Gordon draws a foul in the penalty area.
Alan Gordon (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Thomas Piermayr (Colorado Rapids).

timelineItems.name: Eric Gorski
timelineItems.text: The Nasco era comes to an end. No need to stay up late for this one. Rookie coach, lost season, will still root for #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Jessie Martinez
timelineItems.text: enjoying the galaxy game with my dad. #losangelesgalaxy #lagalaxy #galaxy #soccer #futbol #stubhubcenter

timelineItems.name: The Rapids Apologist
timelineItems.text: If I had to pick a record for #Rapids96 to break it would not have been the one for fastest red card in MLS history.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Juninho (LA Galaxy).
Thomas Piermayr (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Cele Jameson
timelineItems.text: Will Rapids keep 10? Really feel like they may go down to 9. And atleast 1 more Donovan goal #LAvCOL

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Omar Gonzalez (LA Galaxy) header from the centre of the box is blocked.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Omar Gonzalez has header cleared off the line

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Clint Irwin.

timelineItems.name: Francisco Reyes Villa
timelineItems.text: @coloradorapids GK Joe Nasco sent off 🔴 38 seconds in, @10landondonovan with the finish from the spot like he's done it a time or two before. #LAGalaxy #StubHubCenter #ColoradoRapids #LAvCOL #MLS #Soccer #FridayNightFútbol Dedicated goal to #LucaKnowsHeart

timelineItems.name: Luis
timelineItems.text: Let's call it 1-0! Goal by Donovan #lagalaxy

timelineItems.name: Matt Pollard
timelineItems.text: What a great ball. LD almost made something special out of that. #LAGalaxy #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: Alex Caamal
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy #penaltyshot #already #winning #donovan #10 #letsgogalaxy

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the center of the box is blocked.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Gyasi Zardes gets in front but shot is blocked

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Landon Donovan.
Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Marc Burch.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: I think I just heard some fan yell "I like your hair" at Gyasi. #NBCLiveExtra #LAGalaxy #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: VisforValerie
timelineItems.text: That play definitely merited a red card but still feel kinda bad for Nasco. He was emotional walking off the field 😢 #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: Alex Caamal
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy #letsgogalaxy #donovan #cornerkick #10 #soccer #game #stubhubcenter

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Just what #Rapids96 needed. Piermayar appears to turn his ankle, but he'll continue on.

timelineItems.name: Daisy Marquez
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy ⚽️💙💛

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Todd Dunivant (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Landon Donovan.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: WATCH: @landondonovan makes no mistake from the spot: http://t.co/6ayKbPFRXr #LAvCOL #ThanksLD http://t.co/MBW5F06DZp

timelineItems.name: Total MLS
timelineItems.text: 30 seconds in and a penalty and Nasco sees red!!! #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: Alison Rose
timelineItems.text: Whoa! Is that the fastest red card ever? Gotta be close! #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Gabriel
timelineItems.text: Los Angeles vs Colorado! #LAGalaxy #ColoradoRapids #StubHubCenter

timelineItems.name: Alexi Lalas
timelineItems.text: Game over. #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: Jobu's Rum
timelineItems.text: 30 seconds into the game, @ColoradoRapids goalie has been red carded, and a penalty called. You can't tackle people, sir #MLS #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Todd Dunivant (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Nick LaBrocca (Colorado Rapids).

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Game could get to the point where Arena puts GK as a striker and puts Donovan between the sticks. High school tactics #LAGalaxy #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Kalyssa Serrano
timelineItems.text: These people are loud lol #lagalaxy #soccer

timelineItems.name: PeeWee
timelineItems.text: We all cheer, we all cheer for LA! #lagalaxy  #acb121 #stubhub #gogalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, LA Galaxy 6, Colorado Rapids 0.

timelineItems.name: Ron Waxman
timelineItems.text: Colorado Rapids have lost 7 games in a row (getting outscored 22-6), and have won 1 of their last 11 (vs last place Chivas). #MLS #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Steven Goff
timelineItems.text: Galaxy with 19 goals in 5 matches. #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FT: @LAGalaxy put up six on @ColoradoRapids. The goals: http://t.co/GNaV3xeBeg #LAvCOL http://t.co/Sh0LBnfrEU

timelineItems.name: André
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy 6 - Colorado Rapids 0

timelineItems.name: Dan Palmer
timelineItems.text: Another #lagalaxy Friday night. Then a much needed night out. Happy weekend everyone #soccer #friday #california #cali #losangeles #la #dtla

timelineItems.desc: Two teams heading in opposite directions in recent weeks meet when the LA Galaxy play host to the Colorado Rapids on Friday evening at StubHub Center before an NBC Sports Network audience.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: LA Galaxy vs Colorado Rapids | September 5, 2014

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Todd Dunivant (LA Galaxy) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Kristian Russell
timelineItems.text: I have cold chills from this. I seriously love this club and the fans. Amazing. #LAGalaxy #LucaKnowsHeart

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Erik Wickham
timelineItems.text: As much as I hate that COL got a red card, I'm glad a ref is calling it by the book. Cone on Crapids! #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: "LUCA"--"DELAGARZA" chant at StubHub right now. #LAvCOL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Alan Gordon.
Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Chris Klute.
Attempt missed. Omar González (LA Galaxy) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Landon Donovan with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Max Gonzalez
timelineItems.text: Mi Vida #Futbol all thanks to doctor for these seats #lagalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Todd Dunivant (LA Galaxy) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Matt Pollard
timelineItems.text: Seriously though, is Todd Dunivant ok? We don't need to be down to one left back, AGAIN. #LAGalaxy #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: Renea
timelineItems.text: Heavy hearts tonight at the Galaxy game. 👼 #LucaKnowsHeart #RIPLuca  #lagalaxy

timelineItems.name: *@LeXis*
timelineItems.text: G O  G A L A X Y!!!!! #lagalaxy #mls #stubhubcenter #GoGalaxy @lagalaxy @mls

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Josh Guesman
timelineItems.text: Listening to the live stream from 37,000 feet. Getting the feels. You all sounded beautiful. #LucaKnowsHeart #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Natalie C
timelineItems.text: Galaxy game! #LAGalaxy #soccer #Galaxygame

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Todd Dunivant is down & is carted off after getting hit in the midsection earlier. He had ab surgery earlier this yr. Serious for #LAGalaxy.

timelineItems.name: Kalyssa Serrano
timelineItems.text: #ripluca 💚💚 #lagalaxy

timelineItems.name: CroakingLizard
timelineItems.text: So many harsh fouls & a record quick red card. I think Colorado means red in Spanish. Maybe that's why the Rapids are out for blood. #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text:
This is for Luca.

#LAGalaxy fans show their support for @ajd_20 and @megandelagarza by performing a cross stadium chant of his name. #lucaknowsheart

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  LA Galaxy 2, Colorado Rapids 0. Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the left side of the box to the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Baggio Husidic finishes off a beautiful team play

timelineItems.name: xdeevex
timelineItems.text: Come on LA! #lagalaxy #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: Dynamo Theory
timelineItems.text: Fastest red card in the west #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Penalty for @LAGalaxy . Red card for @ColoradoRapids. Less than one minute in. #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: Russ Andolina
timelineItems.text: Tiki-Taco makes me tingle #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: Make them chase the ball. No defensive mistakes. Methodical smart build up. #LAGalaxy #LAvCOL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy).
Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Todd Dunivant left the game with a left groin injury. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Austin Moore Farrow
timelineItems.text: Wow. What a play that was. Gordon, Zardes, Husidic. Class. 2-0 #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: Total MLS
timelineItems.text: Toledo gave Husidic a yellow for removing his shirt after scoring to reveal a shirt honoring Luca. It's a rule but...COME ON. #LAvCOL

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Nick LaBrocca (Colorado Rapids) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Felipe Umana
timelineItems.text: 2-0 ! #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Alex Caamal
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy #anothergoal #winning #donovan #10 #letsgogalaxy #stubhubcenter #gamenight ⚽️

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy update: Robbie Rogers was left out of the gameday roster with a left hamstring strain. #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: david soto
timelineItems.text: Gordon and Zardes play good together #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Marcelo Sarvas is back up after colliding heads with Nick LaBrocca. Was down for a few moments.

timelineItems.text: Worth picking up a yellow card for. http://t.co/Q4WRURiBC6 #LucaKnowsHeart #LAvCOL http://t.co/2lQJoRlYOm

timelineItems.name: Annie Roh
timelineItems.text: I'm thinking like 12 minutes of stoppage time at the half.. #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: Rude Boy 👍
timelineItems.text: Great atmosphere tonight in LA! #LucaKnowsHeart #LAGalaxy #LAvCOL #RealFootballStartedInMarch

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Colorado Rapids. Edson Buddle tries a through ball, but Deshorn Brown is caught offside.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  LA Galaxy 1, Colorado Rapids 0. Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: PK GOAL: Landon Donovan makes no mistake from the spot

timelineItems.name: Matt Pollard
timelineItems.text: Well that escalated quickly. #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: Kelly Garrett
timelineItems.text: Nice American football tackle by the Colorado keeper. Was that the fastest red ever in the MLS?!? #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: W. Knutt Megg Esq.
timelineItems.text: Baldomero Toledo gives a warranted penalty and a red card to a sheriff deputy goalkeeper in the first minute. #OnlyInMLS #Wow #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: Ryanne Miller
timelineItems.text: I wish I was at this @LAGalaxy game right now! So much amazingness! #ThanksLD #LucaKnowsHeart #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Reporter beside me whispers the following after the Husidic goal set up by Gordon: "When did Alan Gordon learn to play soccer?" #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Marvell Wynne.
Attempt missed. Omar González (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Duncan Stewart
timelineItems.text: At Stub Hub center watching Galaxy play Colorado Rapids. Landon Donovan scored in the first 4 minutes. Hurray for him. #lagalaxy #goodgame

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Family. #LucaKnowsHeart #LAvCOL http://t.co/VXEQVkEm3M

timelineItems.comment: Edson Buddle (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Leonardo (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: brendan hannan
timelineItems.text: When you watch Gyasi Zardes play you can see how much Keane and LD have rubbed off on him. #lagalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Juninho (LA Galaxy).
Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Matt Pollard
timelineItems.text: It's a pinball machine inside the Rapids penalty area. So many chances. #LAGalaxy #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: John Rosch
timelineItems.text: I know I may be in the minority, but I am proud so far with the lads with the adversity faced in this half. #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: brendan hannan
timelineItems.text: Also, like Gargan, Alan Gordon having a day with the #lagalaxy Enjoyable atmosphere brings quality play.

timelineItems.desc: Penalty conceded by Chris Klute (Colorado Rapids) after a foul in the penalty area.
timelineItems.title: PENALTY: Gyasi Zardes brought down in box by Chris Klute

timelineItems.name: Matt Pollard
timelineItems.text: Not too much trouble, but good one-handed punch by Rowe in his first real work tonight. #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: Lisa S Johansson
timelineItems.text: And it's a goal for #LAGalaxy http://t.co/4lLZvOntbC

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  LA Galaxy 3, Colorado Rapids 0. Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Gyasi Zardes breaks through and puts in LA's third

timelineItems.name: brendan hannan
timelineItems.text: Say what you will about Bruce Arena, but he implores his teams to pass the rock. Having LD and Keano doesn't hurt. #lagalaxy

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: . @gyasinho extends that lead to three. #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: Amanda
timelineItems.text: Landon wants that assist record. #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Same goal, just from the other side. #LAGalaxy #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: AlexGelhar
timelineItems.text: Goal number 3 for the Galaxy. Confetti for everyone! #LAGalaxy #MLS #fridaynightfootball

timelineItems.name: Jessie Salazar
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy #WackSoccer

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: GOOOOOOOOOOAAAAAAAAAAAAAAALLLLL! GYASI ZARDES! THAT WAS LIQUID FOOTBALL! 3-0! #LAvCOL

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, LA Galaxy 3, Colorado Rapids 0.

timelineItems.name: Ben Jata
timelineItems.text: Pablo Mastroeni: "I don't know the rules as far as red cards go...." Yes you do Pablo. #LAvCOL #MLS

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Landon Donovan with his 130th career assist on that Gyasi Zardes goal. He's just five away from catching Steve Ralston. #ChasingSteve

timelineItems.name: Mike McGuire
timelineItems.text: Fantastic goal by Zardes in what's been his breakout season & we still haven't seen him reach his peak yet still gonna get better #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Hairston and Sanchez out warming up on the sideline during the HT break. #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: Surprisetruck
timelineItems.text: Half time kick and rush. Top entertainment. #nonleague #LAvCOL Seriously British clubs used to involve young fans http://t.co/vHd2czzb2G

timelineItems.name: CR7 vs LM10
timelineItems.text: GOAL! ZARDES SCORES TO MAKE IT 3-0. #GOAL! #Zardes #lagalaxy #MLSoccer #mls #majorleaguesoccer #scores #scoredgolazo #gyasiZardes #gyasi #halftimescore #LAvsCO #LA3COL0

timelineItems.name: brendan hannan
timelineItems.text: LD with assist 130. Six away from record. Zardes with goal 13. Leads all Americans in #MLS Galaxy defense holding a shutout. #lagalaxy

timelineItems.name: s c o t t
timelineItems.text: Watching this new sport called soccer w the boys. #lagalaxy #mls

timelineItems.name: geoff reinhardt
timelineItems.text: #Hyperlapse soccer. Saying farewell to @10landondonovan at @lagalaxy vs Colorado Rapids. Witnessed the fastest red card in @MLS history when the Colorado keeper got sent off less than 30 seconds into the game. #soccer #LAgalaxy #galaxy #LAvsCOL #mls #LA #travel #instavideo @ogonzal1 @gyasinho @chandala

timelineItems.name: Jose Luis Mota
timelineItems.text: What a beauty from Landon Donovan. #landondonovan #thanksld #lagalaxy #football #footballislove #stubhubcenter #paneka #panekapenalty #captainamerica #likeaboss #heistheboss #legend

timelineItems.name: brendan hannan
timelineItems.text: If not for a 58th minute own goal the #lagalaxy would have 360 minutes of shutout soccer since Bruce had a word down 3-1 at half in Denver.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: The @ACBrigade has completely left and exited the facility. Reports of dispute with security during 20th minute tribute.

timelineItems.name: Greg Gelbr
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy lead by 3 goals at the half. All celebrations to my camera on #NBCSN. Fun!

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins LA Galaxy 3, Colorado Rapids 0.
Hand ball by Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids).

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  LA Galaxy 4, Colorado Rapids 0. Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: PK GOAL: Landon Donovan scores his second spot kick of the game

timelineItems.comment: Penalty conceded by Chris Klute (Colorado Rapids) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty LA Galaxy. Gyasi Zardes draws a foul in the penalty area.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 46' PENALTY COLORADO. Klute brings down Zardes. Donovan steps up.

timelineItems.name: BENJ…[ LOADING ]
timelineItems.text: That is, in fact, a penalty, I think. #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: And we’re back for the second half. Watch live on @NBCSN. http://t.co/Q4WRURiBC6 #LAvCOL http://t.co/CrATa4CjbV

timelineItems.name: BENJ…[ LOADING ]
timelineItems.text: I don't like Baldomero Toledo, but … yeah, Zardes gains possession and gets his foot taken from under him. #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: Evan Frost
timelineItems.text: Has there ever been a game where penalties were awarded in the 1st minute of each half? #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: Austin Fido
timelineItems.text: Klute needs a rest. Or not to play right back. #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: 4-0 LA. #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: . @ColoradoRapids look to snap a 6-game losing streak tongiht vs. @LAGalaxy: #LAvCOL http://t.co/QQPoaZy0Qn

timelineItems.name: AlexGelhar
timelineItems.text: Landon Donovan up for the penalty. Of course it was good! We're hoping for a touchdown tonight, currently 4-0. #thankslandon #LAGalaxy #MLS #fridaynightfootball

timelineItems.desc: Stefan Ishizaki (LA Galaxy) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Stefan Ishizaki trips up the breakaway

timelineItems.text: And it's an arresting performance for the former cop playing only his second ever #MLS game, sent off inside a minute of #LAvCOL .

timelineItems.name: Andrew Marcinko
timelineItems.text: Gonzales' distribution underrated IMO. He consistently plays some quality balls out of the back. #LAvCOL #MLS #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Galaxy goal differential now +25, tied for 4th-best single-season mark in league history. Only 1 team has ever gone +30 or better. #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: Daniel
timelineItems.text: Wow, Donovan just ripped off his Luca band showcased it and kissed it, what an incredible goal and celebration! @LAGalaxy #LAvCOL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Edson Buddle.

timelineItems.text: Sucks to be the guy that has to come off for the guy that's subbing for the guy who got red. Ya follow? #LAvCOL

timelineItems.text: 70' I seriously don't believe that Colorado will end this game with 10 men. They're opting for the hack-a-Galaxy defense right now. #COLvLA

timelineItems.text: Ah Buddle you have to bury that sucker. Nothing is working quite right for Colorado #LAvCOL #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy) hits the left post with a right footed shot from the left side of the box. Assisted by Marcelo Sarvas with a cross.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: OFF THE POST FROM HUSIDIC!!! We’re running low on exclamation points… #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: Austin Moore Farrow
timelineItems.text: World class that from Husidic. Excellent late run, & what unbelievable technique, unlucky to hit the near post. #LAvCOL #MLS

timelineItems.name: Marianne Lawrence
timelineItems.text: There are a lot of yellow cards in this game. Goodness. #LAvCOL

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  LA Galaxy 5, Colorado Rapids 0. Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) header from the center of the box to the bottom left corner.

timelineItems.name: Rapid Transplant
timelineItems.text: Seems like we will be everyone's Washington Generals until next season at earliest. Ah well. #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Evan Frost
timelineItems.text: Depending on playoff situation, thinking we might see Zardes in Hartford next month. #LAvCOL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids) left footed shot from long range on the right is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Chris Klute.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Fourteen goals for @gyasinho. That's the most by an MLS Homegrown player in a single-season. #LAvCOL

timelineItems.name: Russ Andolina
timelineItems.text: Kid's ready. Simple. #LAvCOL #USMNT

timelineItems.name: John Bava III
timelineItems.text: Homegrown Hero!! Zardes with his 14th goal of the season. Did you see how high he jumped on that header? Marvelous goal!! #LAvCOL

timelineItems.text: Lesson learned, don't allow your keeper to get a red card in the first minute. #LAvCOL 5-0

timelineItems.name: Antonio M.
timelineItems.text: The Galaxy are doing what a team is supposed to do when they're a man up. Great job boys! #LAGalaxy
